thread.title: Floyd Mayweather's luxury cars catch fire during transport
thread.title_full: Floyd Mayweather's luxury cars catch fire during transport

title: Floyd Mayweather's luxury cars catch fire during transport
text: Share Updated: 7:58 am PHOENIX (KSNV News3LV) -- Local boxing champion Floyd "Money" Mayweather saw a little bit of his money take a hit this week.According to TMZ, a trailer carrying Mayweatherâ€™s Bentley and 2 Rolls Royce cars burned to the ground.They report the truck was taking Floyd's rides from Las Vegas to Miami when something went wrong just outside of Phoneix in the early morning hours of Wednesday.It's not clear how the fire started, but TMZ says no injuries were reported.
